General.Name: Sinostar Cable Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Sinostar Cable Co., Ltd engages in the research and development, production, and sale of wires, cables, and cable accessories. The company offers power cables, electrical equipment wires and cables, bare wires, and special cable products. Its products are used in power grid construction, thermal and hydroelectric power generation, electrified railway, urban rail transit, new energy power generation, petroleum/petrochemical, metallurgy, shipbuilding, home appliances, engineering construction, and other industries. Sinostar Cable Co., Ltd was founded in 2003 and is based in Yixing, China.
